Business Development Manager Job at Paceview Homes




        
    

        
        Paceview Homes is a value-driven real estate firm based in Gariki, Abuja, Nigeria. We’re passionate about helping individuals and families find not just houses but homes. Our services span residential and commercial property sales, leasing, property management, estate development, and real estate investment consultancy. With a foundation built on integrity, innovation, and client satisfaction, we deliver real estate solutions that bring peace of mind and long-term value.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
Core responsibilities:
     

            
    




	Business development: Identify and secure new business opportunities, build a pipeline of potential clients, and nurture relationships with new and existing clients and partners.
	Sales and negotiation: Deliver presentations, create proposals, negotiate contracts, and close deals to secure new business.
	Operations management: Oversee and optimize business operations, manage budgets and resources, and ensure projects align with company objectives.
	Team leadership: Motivate and manage teams, conduct performance evaluations, and provide direction to ensure alignment with the company's mission.
	Performance monitoring: Track performance using key performance indicators (KPIs) and business intelligence tools, and make data-driven decisions to improve outcomes.
	Communication: Facilitate communication between departments, and prepare and present reports to senior leadership.
	Strategy and planning: Develop and implement long-term business strategies, analyze market trends, and create business plans to achieve organizational goals.


Required skills and qualifications


	A degree in business, management, or a related field, with an MBA being a potential advantage.
	Strong leadership, decision-making, and communication skills.
	Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities.
	Financial management and budgeting skills.
	Experience in sales, relationship management, or a similar field, often with years of experience in multiple business facets.


You are also entitled to a 5% commision on sales

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruit@paceviewhomes.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "Restaurant Supervisor",
  "description": "De Yumz Enterprise is&nbsp;a growing restaurant committed to providing high-quality local and continental dishes in a clean, welcoming environment. Our menu combines rich traditional Nigerian flavors with popular international meals, all prepared with fresh ingredients and high standards of hygiene.

We are passionate about customer satisfaction, teamwork, and consistent service excellence. As our business continues to grow, we are looking to employ dedicated and hardworking individuals who are willing to learn, grow, and contribute to our success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Supervisor

Job Locations:&nbsp;Gbagada &amp; Ogudu - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking an experienced and proactive Restaurant Supervisor to oversee daily restaurant operations.
	The ideal candidate will ensure excellent customer service, maintain high food quality standards, drive sales through effective cross-selling, and keep the restaurant clean and well-organized at all times.


Responsibilities


	Supervise daily restaurant operations and staff activities
	Drive sales by promoting menu items and encouraging effective cross-selling
	Taste and inspect food before it is passed out for display or service to ensure quality and consistency
	Ensure the restaurant environment, kitchen, and service areas are clean, organized, and hygienic
	Monitor customer satisfaction and handle complaints professionally
	Ensure staff follow company procedures, hygiene standards, and safety rules
	Track stock levels and report shortages or issues to management
	Support staff training and improve team performance.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a restaurant supervisor or in a similar role
	Good knowledge of food service operations and customer service
	Ability to drive sales and motivate staff
	Strong leadership and communication skills
	Neat appearance and good hygiene practices
	Ability to work under pressure and supervise a team.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;deyumz@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Restaurant Supervisor Job at De Yumz Enterprise




        
    

        
        De Yumz Enterprise is a growing restaurant committed to providing high-quality local and continental dishes in a clean, welcoming environment. Our menu combines rich traditional Nigerian flavors with popular international meals, all prepared with fresh ingredients and high standards of hygiene.

We are passionate about customer satisfaction, teamwork, and consistent service excellence. As our business continues to grow, we are looking to employ dedicated and hardworking individuals who are willing to learn, grow, and contribute to our success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Supervisor
     

            
    



Job Locations: Gbagada & Ogudu - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking an experienced and proactive Restaurant Supervisor to oversee daily restaurant operations.
	The ideal candidate will ensure excellent customer service, maintain high food quality standards, drive sales through effective cross-selling, and keep the restaurant clean and well-organized at all times.


Responsibilities


	Supervise daily restaurant operations and staff activities
	Drive sales by promoting menu items and encouraging effective cross-selling
	Taste and inspect food before it is passed out for display or service to ensure quality and consistency
	Ensure the restaurant environment, kitchen, and service areas are clean, organized, and hygienic
	Monitor customer satisfaction and handle complaints professionally
	Ensure staff follow company procedures, hygiene standards, and safety rules
	Track stock levels and report shortages or issues to management
	Support staff training and improve team performance.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a restaurant supervisor or in a similar role
	Good knowledge of food service operations and customer service
	Ability to drive sales and motivate staff
	Strong leadership and communication skills
	Neat appearance and good hygiene practices
	Ability to work under pressure and supervise a team.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: deyumz@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more inquires, Whatsapp: 09162682632.
